Name: Gunmancer
About the game: Gunmancer is a science fantasy roguelike top-down shooter. Summon guns as you shoot your way through mysterious randomly generated dungeons full of ancient forbidden magic of guns and dangerous monsters. Key Features Action combat - quick-paced reflex heavy shooting and dodging Bosses - defeat a terrifying boss at end of each dungeon Progression - become the most powerful gunmancer that ever lived as you find more and more destructive secrets of gun magic Randomly generated dungeons - a huge variety of rooms and enemies Create your weaponry out of thin air Place down floating magic guns that shoot when you do Take the shooting to next level as you shoot through every enemy in the room with half a dozen guns at once
Meta Title: Gunmancer: Jul 26, 2021, Štěpán Meister and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Gunmancer? Check out the release date (Jul 26, 2021), developer insights from Štěpán Meister, and a complete game summary.
